text:
Study with drug #HydroxyChloroquine  and #chloroquine found no benefit and linked it instead to an elevated risk of death and abnormal heart rhythms, was performed with around 100.000 patientes at 671 hospitals on 6 continents. https://t.co/uBmU6r7Uc1
